info.title: OANDA v20 REST API
info.description: The full OANDA v20 REST API Specification. This specification defines how to interact with v20 Accounts, Trades, Orders, Pricing and more.

get.description: Get a list of all Accounts authorized for the provided token.

200.description: The list of authorized Accounts has been provided.

accounts.description: The list of Accounts the client is authorized to access and their associated properties.

get.description: Get the full details for a single Account that a client has access to. Full pending Order, open Trade and open Position representations are provided.

200.description: The full Account details are provided

account.description: The full details of the requested Account.

lastTransactionID.description: The ID of the most recent Transaction created for the Account.
lastTransactionID.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

get.description: Get a summary for a single Account that a client has access to.

200.description: The Account summary  are provided

account.description: The summary of the requested Account.

lastTransactionID.description: The ID of the most recent Transaction created for the Account.
lastTransactionID.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

get.description: Get the list of tradeable instruments for the given Account. The list of tradeable instruments is dependent on the regulatory division that the Account is located in, thus should be the same for all Accounts owned by a single user.

parameters.name: instruments
parameters.despcription: List of instruments to query specifically.

items.format: A string containing the base currency and quote currency delimited by a "_".

200.description: The list of tradeable instruments for the Account has been provided.

patch.description: Set the client-configurable portions of an Account.

parameters.name: configureAccountBody
parameters.despcription: Representation of the Account configuration to set

marginRate.description: The string representation of a decimal number.
marginRate.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on what the number represents.

200.description: The Account was configured successfully.

configureTransaction.description: The transaction that configures the Account.

lastTransactionID.description: The ID of the last Transaction created for the Account.
lastTransactionID.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

400.description: The Account could not be configured successfully.

configureRejectTransaction.description: The transaction that rejects the configuration of the Account.

lastTransactionID.description: The ID of the last Transaction created for the Account.
lastTransactionID.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

errorCode.description: The code of the error that has occurred. This field may not be returned for some errors.

errorMessage.description: The human-readable description of the error that has occurred.

get.description: Endpoint used to poll an Account for its current state and changes since a specified TransactionID.

parameters.name: sinceTransactionID
parameters.despcription: ID of the Transaction to get Account changes since.
parameters.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

200.description: The Account state and changes are provided.

changes.description: The changes to the Account's Orders, Trades and Positions since the specified Transaction ID. Only provided if the sinceTransactionID is supplied to the poll request.

lastTransactionID.description: The ID of the last Transaction created for the Account.  This Transaction ID should be used for future poll requests, as the client has already observed all changes up to and including it.
lastTransactionID.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

post.description: Create an Order for an Account

order.description: Specification of the Order to create

201.description: The Order was created as specified

Location.description: A link to the Order that was just created

orderCreateTransaction.description: The Transaction that created the Order specified by the request.

orderFillTransaction.description: The Transaction that filled the newly created Order. Only provided when the Order was immediately filled.

orderCancelTransaction.description: The Transaction that cancelled the newly created Order. Only provided when the Order was immediately cancelled.

orderReissueTransaction.description: The Transaction that reissues the Order. Only provided when the Order is configured to be reissued for its remaining units after a partial fill and the reissue was successful.

orderReissueRejectTransaction.description: The Transaction that rejects the reissue of the Order. Only provided when the Order is configured to be reissued for its remaining units after a partial fill and the reissue was rejected.

relatedTransactionIDs.description: The IDs of all Transactions that were created while satisfying the request.

lastTransactionID.description: The ID of the most recent Transaction created for the Account
lastTransactionID.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

orderRejectTransaction.description: The Transaction that rejected the creation of the Order as requested

relatedTransactionIDs.description: The IDs of all Transactions that were created while satisfying the request.

lastTransactionID.description: The ID of the most recent Transaction created for the Account
lastTransactionID.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

errorCode.description: The code of the error that has occurred. This field may not be returned for some errors.

errorMessage.description: The human-readable description of the error that has occurred.

get.description: Get a list of Orders for an Account

parameters.name: ids
parameters.despcription: List of Order IDs to retrieve

items.format: The string representation of the OANDA-assigned OrderID. OANDA-assigned OrderIDs are positive integers, and are derived from the TransactionID of the Transaction that created the Order.

parameters.name: state
parameters.despcription: The state to filter the requested Orders by

parameters.name: instrument
parameters.despcription: The instrument to filter the requested orders by
parameters.format: A string containing the base currency and quote currency delimited by a "_".

parameters.name: count
parameters.despcription: The maximum number of Orders to return

parameters.name: beforeID
parameters.despcription: The maximum Order ID to return. If not provided the most recent Orders in the Account are returned
parameters.format: The string representation of the OANDA-assigned OrderID. OANDA-assigned OrderIDs are positive integers, and are derived from the TransactionID of the Transaction that created the Order.

200.description: The list of Orders requested

Link.description: A link to the next page of results if the results were paginated

orders.description: The list of Order detail objects

lastTransactionID.description: The ID of the most recent Transaction created for the Account
lastTransactionID.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

get.description: List all pending Orders in an Account

200.description: List of pending Orders for the Account

orders.description: The list of pending Order details

lastTransactionID.description: The ID of the most recent Transaction created for the Account
lastTransactionID.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

get.description: Get details for a single Order in an Account

200.description: The details of the Order requested

Link.description: A link to the next page of results if the results were paginated

order.description: The details of the Order requested

lastTransactionID.description: The ID of the most recent Transaction created for the Account
lastTransactionID.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

put.description: Replace an Order in an Account by simultaneously cancelling it and creating a replacement Order

parameters.name: orderID
parameters.despcription: ID of the Order to cancel.
parameters.format: Either the Order's OANDA-assigned OrderID or the Order's client-provided ClientID prefixed by the "@" symbol

parameters.name: replaceOrderBody
parameters.despcription: Specification of the replacing Order. The replacing order must have the same type as the replaced Order.

201.description: The Order was successfully cancelled and replaced

Location.description: A link to the replacing Order

orderCancelTransaction.description: The Transaction that cancelled the Order to be replaced.

orderCreateTransaction.description: The Transaction that created the replacing Order as requested.

orderFillTransaction.description: The Transaction that filled the replacing Order. This is only provided when the replacing Order was immediately filled.

orderReissueTransaction.description: The Transaction that reissues the replacing Order. Only provided when the replacing Order was partially filled immediately and is configured to be reissued for its remaining units.

orderReissueRejectTransaction.description: The Transaction that rejects the reissue of the Order. Only provided when the replacing Order was paritially filled immediately and was configured to be reissued, however the reissue was rejected.

replacingOrderCancelTransaction.description: The Transaction that cancelled the replacing Order. Only provided when the replacing Order was immediately cancelled.

relatedTransactionIDs.description: The IDs of all Transactions that were created while satisfying the request.

lastTransactionID.description: The ID of the most recent Transaction created for the Account
lastTransactionID.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

orderRejectTransaction.description: The Transaction that rejected the creation of the replacing Order

relatedTransactionIDs.description: The IDs of all Transactions that were created while satisfying the request.

lastTransactionID.description: The ID of the most recent Transaction created for the Account.
lastTransactionID.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

errorCode.description: The code of the error that has occurred. This field may not be returned for some errors.

errorMessage.description: The human-readable description of the error that has occurred.

put.description: Cancel a pending Order in an Account

200.description: The Order was cancelled as specified

orderCancelTransaction.description: The Transaction that cancelled the Order

relatedTransactionIDs.description: The IDs of all Transactions that were created while satisfying the request.

lastTransactionID.description: The ID of the most recent Transaction created for the Account
lastTransactionID.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

404.description: The Order in the Account could not be cancelled

orderCancelRejectTransaction.description: The Transaction that rejected the cancellation of the Order

relatedTransactionIDs.description: The IDs of all Transactions that were created while satisfying the request.

lastTransactionID.description: The ID of the most recent Transaction created for the Account
lastTransactionID.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

errorCode.description: The code of the error that has occurred. This field may not be returned for some errors.

errorMessage.description: The human-readable description of the error that has occurred.

put.description: Update the Client Extensions for an Order in an Account. Do not set, modify, or delete clientExtensions if your account is associated with MT4.

parameters.name: setOrderClientExtensionsBody
parameters.despcription: Representation of the replacing Order

clientExtensions.description: The Client Extensions to update for the Order. Do not set, modify, or delete clientExtensions if your account is associated with MT4.

tradeClientExtensions.description: The Client Extensions to update for the Trade created when the Order is filled. Do not set, modify, or delete clientExtensions if your account is associated with MT4.

200.description: The Order's Client Extensions were successfully modified

orderClientExtensionsModifyTransaction.description: The Transaction that modified the Client Extensions for the Order

lastTransactionID.description: The ID of the most recent Transaction created for the Account
lastTransactionID.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

400.description: The Order Client Extensions specification was invalid

orderClientExtensionsModifyRejectTransac.description: The Transaction that rejected the modification of the Client Extensions for the Order

lastTransactionID.description: The ID of the most recent Transaction created for the Account
lastTransactionID.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

errorCode.description: The code of the error that has occurred. This field may not be returned for some errors.

errorMessage.description: The human-readable description of the error that has occurred.

get.description: List all Positions for an Account. The Positions returned are for every instrument that has had a position during the lifetime of an the Account.

200.description: The Account's Positions are provided.

lastTransactionID.description: The ID of the most recent Transaction created for the Account
lastTransactionID.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

get.description: List all open Positions for an Account. An open Position is a Position in an Account that currently has a Trade opened for it.

200.description: The Account's open Positions are provided.

positions.description: The list of open Positions in the Account.

lastTransactionID.description: The ID of the most recent Transaction created for the Account
lastTransactionID.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

get.description: Get the details of a single Instrument's Position in an Account. The Position may by open or not.

200.description: The Position is provided.

lastTransactionID.description: The ID of the most recent Transaction created for the Account
lastTransactionID.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

put.description: Closeout the open Position for a specific instrument in an Account.

parameters.name: closePositionBody
parameters.despcription: Representation of how to close the position

longUnits.description: Indication of how much of the long Position to closeout. Either the string "ALL", the string "NONE", or a DecimalNumber representing how many units of the long position to close using a PositionCloseout MarketOrder. The units specified must always be positive.

longClientExtensions.description: The client extensions to add to the MarketOrder used to close the long position.

shortUnits.description: Indication of how much of the short Position to closeout. Either the string "ALL", the string "NONE", or a DecimalNumber representing how many units of the short position to close using a PositionCloseout MarketOrder. The units specified must always be positive.

shortClientExtensions.description: The client extensions to add to the MarketOrder used to close the short position.

200.description: The Position closeout request has been successfully processed.

Location.description: A link to the Position that was just closed out

longOrderCreateTransaction.description: The MarketOrderTransaction created to close the long Position.

longOrderFillTransaction.description: OrderFill Transaction that closes the long Position

longOrderCancelTransaction.description: OrderCancel Transaction that cancels the MarketOrder created to close the long Position

shortOrderCreateTransaction.description: The MarketOrderTransaction created to close the short Position.

shortOrderFillTransaction.description: OrderFill Transaction that closes the short Position

shortOrderCancelTransaction.description: OrderCancel Transaction that cancels the MarketOrder created to close the short Position

relatedTransactionIDs.description: The IDs of all Transactions that were created while satisfying the request.

lastTransactionID.description: The ID of the most recent Transaction created for the Account
lastTransactionID.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

400.description: The Parameters provided that describe the Position closeout are invalid.

longOrderRejectTransaction.description: The Transaction created that rejects the creation of a MarketOrder to close the long Position.

shortOrderRejectTransaction.description: The Transaction created that rejects the creation of a MarketOrder to close the short Position.

relatedTransactionIDs.description: The IDs of all Transactions that were created while satisfying the request.

lastTransactionID.description: The ID of the most recent Transaction created for the Account
lastTransactionID.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

errorCode.description: The code of the error that has occurred. This field may not be returned for some errors.

errorMessage.description: The human-readable description of the error that has occurred.

get.description: Fetch the user information for the specified user. This endpoint is intended to be used by the user themself to obtain their own information.

200.description: The user information has been provided

userInfo.description: The user information for the specifier user.

get.description: Fetch the externally-available user information for the specified user. This endpoint is intended to be used by 3rd parties that have been authorized by a user to view their personal information.

200.description: The external user information has been provided

userInfo.description: The user information for the specifier user.

get.description: Get a list of Transactions pages that satisfy a time-based Transaction query.

parameters.name: from
parameters.despcription: The starting time (inclusive) of the time range for the Transactions being queried.
parameters.format: A string conforming to RFC 3339 (https://tools.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3339.txt). The amount of sub-second precision provided may represent milliseconds (000 to 999), microseconds (000000 to 999999) or nanoseconds (000000000 to 999999999).

parameters.name: to
parameters.despcription: The ending time (inclusive) of the time range for the Transactions being queried.
parameters.format: A string conforming to RFC 3339 (https://tools.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3339.txt). The amount of sub-second precision provided may represent milliseconds (000 to 999), microseconds (000000 to 999999) or nanoseconds (000000000 to 999999999).

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.despcription: The number of Transactions to include in each page of the results.

parameters.name: type
parameters.despcription: A filter for restricting the types of Transactions to retreive.

200.description: The requested time range of Transaction pages are provided.

from.description: The starting time provided in the request.
from.format: A string conforming to RFC 3339 (https://tools.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3339.txt). The amount of sub-second precision provided may represent milliseconds (000 to 999), microseconds (000000 to 999999) or nanoseconds (000000000 to 999999999).

to.description: The ending time provided in the request.
to.format: A string conforming to RFC 3339 (https://tools.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3339.txt). The amount of sub-second precision provided may represent milliseconds (000 to 999), microseconds (000000 to 999999) or nanoseconds (000000000 to 999999999).

pageSize.description: The pageSize provided in the request

type.description: The Transaction-type filter provided in the request

count.description: The number of Transactions that are contained in the pages returned

pages.description: The list of URLs that represent idrange queries providing the data for each page in the query results

lastTransactionID.description: The ID of the most recent Transaction created for the Account
lastTransactionID.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

get.description: Get the details of a single Account Transaction.

200.description: The details of the requested Transaction are provided.

transaction.description: The details of the Transaction requested

lastTransactionID.description: The ID of the most recent Transaction created for the Account
lastTransactionID.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

get.description: Get a range of Transactions for an Account based on the Transaction IDs.

parameters.name: from
parameters.despcription: The starting Transacion ID (inclusive) to fetch.
parameters.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

parameters.name: to
parameters.despcription: The ending Transaction ID (inclusive) to fetch.
parameters.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

parameters.name: type
parameters.despcription: The filter that restricts the types of Transactions to retreive.

200.description: The requested time range of Transactions are provided.

transactions.description: The list of Transactions that satisfy the request.

lastTransactionID.description: The ID of the most recent Transaction created for the Account
lastTransactionID.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

get.description: Get a range of Transactions for an Account starting at (but not including) a provided Transaction ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.despcription: The ID of the last Transacion fetched. This query will return all Transactions newer than the TransactionID.
parameters.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

200.description: The requested time range of Transactions are provided.

transactions.description: The list of Transactions that satisfy the request.

lastTransactionID.description: The ID of the most recent Transaction created for the Account
lastTransactionID.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

get.description: Get a stream of Transactions for an Account starting from when the request is made.

200.description: Connecting to the Transaction Stream was successful.

schema.description:
The response body for the Transaction Stream uses chunked transfer encoding.  Each chunk contains Transaction and/or TransactionHeartbeat objects encoded as JSON.  Each JSON object is serialized into a single line of text, and multiple objects found in the same chunk are separated by newlines.
TransactionHeartbeats are sent every 5 seconds.

transaction.description: An Account Transaction in the Transaction stream

heartbeat.description: A Heartbeat message in the Transaction Stream

get.description: Get pricing information for a specified list of Instruments within an Account.

parameters.name: instruments
parameters.despcription: List of Instruments to get pricing for.

items.format: A string containing the base currency and quote currency delimited by a "_".

parameters.name: since
parameters.despcription: Date/Time filter to apply to the returned prices. Only prices with a time later than this filter will be provided.
parameters.format: A string conforming to RFC 3339 (https://tools.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3339.txt). The amount of sub-second precision provided may represent milliseconds (000 to 999), microseconds (000000 to 999999) or nanoseconds (000000000 to 999999999).

parameters.name: includeUnitsAvailable
parameters.despcription: Flag that enables the inclusion of the unitsAvailable field in the returned Price objects.

200.description: Pricing information has been successfully provided.

prices.description: The list of Price objects requested

get.description: Get a stream of Prices for an Account starting from when the request is made.

parameters.name: instruments
parameters.despcription: List of Instruments to stream Prices for.

items.format: A string containing the base currency and quote currency delimited by a "_".

parameters.name: snapshot
parameters.despcription: Flag that enables/disables the sending of a pricing snapshot when initially connecting to the stream.

200.description: Connecting to the Price Stream was successful.

Link.description: A link to the next/previous order book snapshot.

schema.description:
The response body for the Pricing Stream uses chunked transfer encoding.  Each chunk contains Price and/or PricingHeartbeat objects encoded as JSON.  Each JSON object is serialized into a single line of text, and multiple objects found in the same chunk are separated by newlines.
Heartbeats are sent every 5 seconds.

price.description: An Account Price in the Pricing Stream

heartbeat.description: A PricingHeartbeat message in the Pricing Stream

get.description: Get a list of Trades for an Account

parameters.name: ids
parameters.despcription: List of Trade IDs to retrieve.

items.format: The string representation of the OANDA-assigned TradeID. OANDA-assigned TradeIDs are positive integers, and are derived from the TransactionID of the Transaction that opened the Trade.

parameters.name: state
parameters.despcription: The state to filter the requested Trades by.

parameters.name: instrument
parameters.despcription: The instrument to filter the requested Trades by.
parameters.format: A string containing the base currency and quote currency delimited by a "_".

parameters.name: count
parameters.despcription: The maximum number of Trades to return.

parameters.name: beforeID
parameters.despcription: The maximum Trade ID to return. If not provided the most recent Trades in the Account are returned.
parameters.format: The string representation of the OANDA-assigned TradeID. OANDA-assigned TradeIDs are positive integers, and are derived from the TransactionID of the Transaction that opened the Trade.

200.description: The list of Trades requested

Link.description: A link to the next page of Trades if the results were paginated

trades.description: The list of Trade detail objects

lastTransactionID.description: The ID of the most recent Transaction created for the Account
lastTransactionID.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

get.description: Get the list of open Trades for an Account

200.description: The Account's list of open Trades is provided

trades.description: The Account's list of open Trades

lastTransactionID.description: The ID of the most recent Transaction created for the Account
lastTransactionID.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

get.description: Get the details of a specific Trade in an Account

200.description: The details for the requested Trade is provided

trade.description: The Account's list of open Trades

lastTransactionID.description: The ID of the most recent Transaction created for the Account
lastTransactionID.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

put.description: Close (partially or fully) a specific open Trade in an Account

parameters.name: closeTradeBody
parameters.despcription: Details of how much of the open Trade to close.

units.description: Indication of how much of the Trade to close. Either the string "ALL" (indicating that all of the Trade should be closed), or a DecimalNumber representing the number of units of the open Trade to Close using a TradeClose MarketOrder. The units specified must always be positive, and the magnitude of the value cannot exceed the magnitude of the Trade's open units.

200.description: The Trade has been closed as requested

orderCreateTransaction.description: The MarketOrder Transaction created to close the Trade.

orderFillTransaction.description: The OrderFill Transaction that fills the Trade-closing MarketOrder and closes the Trade.

orderCancelTransaction.description: The OrderCancel Transaction that immediately cancelled the Trade-closing MarketOrder.

relatedTransactionIDs.description: The IDs of all Transactions that were created while satisfying the request.

lastTransactionID.description: The ID of the most recent Transaction created for the Account
lastTransactionID.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

400.description: The Trade cannot be closed as requested.

orderRejectTransaction.description: The MarketOrderReject Transaction that rejects the creation of the Trade-closing MarketOrder.

errorCode.description: The code of the error that has occurred. This field may not be returned for some errors.

errorMessage.description: The human-readable description of the error that has occurred.

404.description: The Account or Trade does not exist

orderRejectTransaction.description: The MarketOrderReject Transaction that rejects the creation of the Trade-closing MarketOrder.

errorCode.description: The code of the error that has occurred. This field may not be returned for some errors.

errorMessage.description: The human-readable description of the error that has occurred.

put.description: Update the Client Extensions for a Trade. Do not add, update, or delete the Client Extensions if your account is associated with MT4.

parameters.name: setTradeClientExtensionsBody
parameters.despcription: Details of how to modify the Trade's Client Extensions.

clientExtensions.description: The Client Extensions to update the Trade with. Do not add, update, or delete the Client Extensions if your account is associated with MT4.

200.description: The Trade's Client Extensions have been updated as requested.

tradeClientExtensionsModifyTransaction.description: The Transaction that updates the Trade's Client Extensions.

relatedTransactionIDs.description: The IDs of all Transactions that were created while satisfying the request.

lastTransactionID.description: The ID of the most recent Transaction created for the Account
lastTransactionID.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

400.description: The Trade's Client Extensions cannot be modified as requested.

tradeClientExtensionsModifyRejectTransac.description: The Transaction that rejects the modification of the Trade's Client Extensions.

lastTransactionID.description: The ID of the most recent Transaction created for the Account.
lastTransactionID.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

errorCode.description: The code of the error that has occurred. This field may not be returned for some errors.

errorMessage.description: The human-readable description of the error that has occurred.

put.description: Create, replace and cancel a Trade's dependent Orders (Take Profit, Stop Loss and Trailing Stop Loss) through the Trade itself

parameters.name: setTradeDependentOrdersBody
parameters.despcription: Details of how to modify the Trade's dependent Orders.

takeProfit.description: The specification of the Take Profit to create/modify/cancel. If takeProfit is set to null, the Take Profit Order will be cancelled if it exists. If takeProfit is not provided, the exisiting Take Profit Order will not be modified. If a sub-field of takeProfit is not specified, that field will be set to a default value on create, and be inherited by the replacing order on modify.

stopLoss.description: The specification of the Stop Loss to create/modify/cancel. If stopLoss is set to null, the Stop Loss Order will be cancelled if it exists. If stopLoss is not provided, the exisiting Stop Loss Order will not be modified. If a sub-field of stopLoss is not specified, that field will be set to a default value on create, and be inherited by the replacing order on modify.

trailingStopLoss.description: The specification of the Trailing Stop Loss to create/modify/cancel. If trailingStopLoss is set to null, the Trailing Stop Loss Order will be cancelled if it exists. If trailingStopLoss is not provided, the exisiting Trailing Stop Loss Order will not be modified. If a sub-field of trailngStopLoss is not specified, that field will be set to a default value on create, and be inherited by the replacing order on modify.

200.description: The Trade's dependent Orders have been modified as requested.

takeProfitOrderCancelTransaction.description: The Transaction created that cancels the Trade's existing Take Profit Order.

takeProfitOrderTransaction.description: The Transaction created that creates a new Take Profit Order for the Trade.

takeProfitOrderFillTransaction.description: The Transaction created that immediately fills the Trade's new Take Profit Order. Only provided if the new Take Profit Order was immediately filled.

takeProfitOrderCreatedCancelTransaction.description: The Transaction created that immediately cancels the Trade's new Take Profit Order. Only provided if the new Take Profit Order was immediately cancelled.

stopLossOrderCancelTransaction.description: The Transaction created that cancels the Trade's existing Stop Loss Order.

stopLossOrderTransaction.description: The Transaction created that creates a new Stop Loss Order for the Trade.

stopLossOrderFillTransaction.description: The Transaction created that immediately fills the Trade's new Stop Order. Only provided if the new Stop Loss Order was immediately filled.

stopLossOrderCreatedCancelTransaction.description: The Transaction created that immediately cancels the Trade's new Stop Loss Order. Only provided if the new Stop Loss Order was immediately cancelled.

trailingStopLossOrderCancelTransaction.description: The Transaction created that cancels the Trade's existing Trailing Stop Loss Order.

trailingStopLossOrderTransaction.description: The Transaction created that creates a new Trailing Stop Loss Order for the Trade.

relatedTransactionIDs.description: The IDs of all Transactions that were created while satisfying the request.

lastTransactionID.description: The ID of the most recent Transaction created for the Account
lastTransactionID.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

400.description: The Trade's dependent Orders cannot be modified as requested.

takeProfitOrderCancelRejectTransaction.description: An OrderCancelRejectTransaction represents the rejection of the cancellation of an Order in the client's Account.

takeProfitOrderRejectTransaction.description: A TakeProfitOrderRejectTransaction represents the rejection of the creation of a TakeProfit Order.

stopLossOrderCancelRejectTransaction.description: An OrderCancelRejectTransaction represents the rejection of the cancellation of an Order in the client's Account.

stopLossOrderRejectTransaction.description: A StopLossOrderRejectTransaction represents the rejection of the creation of a StopLoss Order.

trailingStopLossOrderCancelRejectTransac.description: An OrderCancelRejectTransaction represents the rejection of the cancellation of an Order in the client's Account.

trailingStopLossOrderRejectTransaction.description: A TrailingStopLossOrderRejectTransaction represents the rejection of the creation of a TrailingStopLoss Order.

lastTransactionID.description: The ID of the most recent Transaction created for the Account.
lastTransactionID.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

errorCode.description: The code of the error that has occurred. This field may not be returned for some errors.

errorMessage.description: The human-readable description of the error that has occurred.

get.description: Fetch candlestick data for an instrument.

parameters.name: price
parameters.despcription: The Price component(s) to get candlestick data for. Can contain any combination of the characters "M" (midpoint candles) "B" (bid candles) and "A" (ask candles).

parameters.name: granularity
parameters.despcription: The granularity of the candlesticks to fetch

parameters.name: count
parameters.despcription: The number of candlesticks to return in the reponse. Count should not be specified if both the start and end parameters are provided, as the time range combined with the graularity will determine the number of candlesticks to return.

parameters.name: from
parameters.despcription: The start of the time range to fetch candlesticks for.
parameters.format: A string conforming to RFC 3339 (https://tools.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3339.txt). The amount of sub-second precision provided may represent milliseconds (000 to 999), microseconds (000000 to 999999) or nanoseconds (000000000 to 999999999).

parameters.name: to
parameters.despcription: The end of the time range to fetch candlesticks for.
parameters.format: A string conforming to RFC 3339 (https://tools.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3339.txt). The amount of sub-second precision provided may represent milliseconds (000 to 999), microseconds (000000 to 999999) or nanoseconds (000000000 to 999999999).

parameters.name: smooth
parameters.despcription: A flag that controls whether the candlestick is "smoothed" or not.  A smoothed candlestick uses the previous candle's close price as its open price, while an unsmoothed candlestick uses the first price from its time range as its open price.

parameters.name: includeFirst
parameters.despcription: A flag that controls whether the candlestick that is covered by the from time should be included in the results. This flag enables clients to use the timestamp of the last completed candlestick received to poll for future candlesticks but avoid receiving the previous candlestick repeatedly.

parameters.name: dailyAlignment
parameters.despcription: The hour of the day (in the specified timezone) to use for granularities that have daily alignments.

parameters.name: alignmentTimezone
parameters.despcription: The timezone to use for the dailyAlignment parameter. Candlesticks with daily alignment will be aligned to the dailyAlignment hour within the alignmentTimezone.

parameters.name: weeklyAlignment
parameters.despcription: The day of the week used for granularities that have weekly alignment.

200.description: Pricing information has been successfully provided.

instrument.description: The instrument whose Prices are represented by the candlesticks.
instrument.format: A string containing the base currency and quote currency delimited by a "_".

granularity.description: The granularity of the candlesticks provided.

candles.description: The list of candlesticks that satisfy the request.

AccountID.description: The string representation of an Account Identifier.

Account.description: The full details of a client's Account. This includes full open Trade, open Position and pending Order representation.

id.format: "-"-delimited string with format "{siteID}-{divisionID}-{userID}-{accountNumber}"

alias.description: Client-assigned alias for the Account. Only provided if the Account has an alias set

currency.description: The home currency of the Account
currency.format: A string containing an ISO 4217 currency (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217)

balance.description: The current balance of the Account. Represented in the Account's home currency.
balance.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Account's home currency.

createdByUserID.description: ID of the user that created the Account.

createdTime.description: The date/time when the Account was created.
createdTime.format: A string conforming to RFC 3339 (https://tools.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3339.txt). The amount of sub-second precision provided may represent milliseconds (000 to 999), microseconds (000000 to 999999) or nanoseconds (000000000 to 999999999).

pl.description: The total profit/loss realized over the lifetime of the Account. Represented in the Account's home currency.
pl.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Account's home currency.

resettabledPL.description: The total realized profit/loss for the Account since it was last reset by the client. Represented in the Account's home currency.
resettabledPL.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Account's home currency.

resettabledPLTime.description: The date/time that the Account's resettablePL was last reset.
resettabledPLTime.format: A string conforming to RFC 3339 (https://tools.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3339.txt). The amount of sub-second precision provided may represent milliseconds (000 to 999), microseconds (000000 to 999999) or nanoseconds (000000000 to 999999999).

marginRate.description: Client-provided margin rate override for the Account. The effective margin rate of the Account is the lesser of this value and the OANDA margin rate for the Account's division. This value is only provided if a margin rate override exists for the Account.
marginRate.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on what the number represents.

marginCallEnterTime.description: The date/time when the Account entered a margin call state. Only provided if the Account is in a margin call.
marginCallEnterTime.format: A string conforming to RFC 3339 (https://tools.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3339.txt). The amount of sub-second precision provided may represent milliseconds (000 to 999), microseconds (000000 to 999999) or nanoseconds (000000000 to 999999999).

marginCallExtensionCount.description: The number of times that the Account's current margin call was extended.

lastMarginCallExtensionTime.description: The date/time of the Account's last margin call extension.
lastMarginCallExtensionTime.format: A string conforming to RFC 3339 (https://tools.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3339.txt). The amount of sub-second precision provided may represent milliseconds (000 to 999), microseconds (000000 to 999999) or nanoseconds (000000000 to 999999999).

openTradeCount.description: The number of Trades currently open in the Account.

openPositionCount.description: The number of Positions currently open in the Account.

pendingOrderCount.description: The number of Orders currently pending in the Account.

hedgingEnabled.description: Flag indicating that the Account has hedging enabled.

unrealizedPL.description: The total unrealized profit/loss for all Trades currently open in the Account. Represented in the Account's home currency.
unrealizedPL.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Account's home currency.

NAV.description: The net asset value of the Account. Equal to Account balance + unrealizedPL. Represented in the Account's home currency.
NAV.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Account's home currency.

marginUsed.description: Margin currently used for the Account. Represented in the Account's home currency.
marginUsed.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Account's home currency.

marginAvailable.description: Margin available for Account. Represented in the Account's home currency.
marginAvailable.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Account's home currency.

positionValue.description: The value of the Account's open positions represented in the Account's home currency.
positionValue.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Account's home currency.

marginCloseoutUnrealizedPL.description: The Account's margin closeout unrealized PL.
marginCloseoutUnrealizedPL.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Account's home currency.

marginCloseoutNAV.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Account's home currency.

marginCloseoutMarginUsed.description: The Account's margin closeout margin used.
marginCloseoutMarginUsed.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Account's home currency.

marginCloseoutPercent.description: The Account's margin closeout percentage. When this value is 1.0 or above the Account is in a margin closeout situation.
marginCloseoutPercent.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on what the number represents.

withdrawalLimit.description: The current WithdrawalLimit for the account which will be zero or a positive value indicating how much can be withdrawn from the account.
withdrawalLimit.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Account's home currency.

marginCallMarginUsed.description: The Account's margin call margin used.
marginCallMarginUsed.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Account's home currency.

marginCallPercent.description: The Account's margin call percentage. When this value is 1.0 or above the Account is in a margin call situation.
marginCallPercent.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on what the number represents.

lastTransactionID.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

trades.description: The details of the Trades currently open in the Account.

AccountChanges.description: An AccountChanges Object is used to represent the changes to an Account's Orders, Trades and Positions since a specified Account TransactionID in the past.

ordersCreated.description: The Orders created. These Orders may have been filled, cancelled or triggered in the same period.

transactions.description: The Transactions that have been generated.

AccountFinancingMode.description: The financing mode of an Account

PositionAggregationMode.description: The way that position values for an Account are calculated and aggregated.

OrderID.description: The Order's identifier, unique within the Order's Account.
OrderID.format: The string representation of the OANDA-assigned OrderID. OANDA-assigned OrderIDs are positive integers, and are derived from the TransactionID of the Transaction that created the Order.

OrderState.description: The current state of the Order.

OrderIdentifier.description: An OrderIdentifier is used to refer to an Order, and contains both the OrderID and the ClientOrderID.

orderID.format: The string representation of the OANDA-assigned OrderID. OANDA-assigned OrderIDs are positive integers, and are derived from the TransactionID of the Transaction that created the Order.

OrderSpecifier.description: The specification of an Order as referred to by clients
OrderSpecifier.format: Either the Order's OANDA-assigned OrderID or the Order's client-provided ClientID prefixed by the "@" symbol

TimeInForce.description: The time-in-force of an Order. TimeInForce describes how long an Order should remain pending before being automatically cancelled by the execution system.

OrderPositionFill.description: Specification of how Positions in the Account are modified when the Order is filled.

DynamicOrderState.description: The dynamic state of an Order. This is only relevant to TrailingStopLoss Orders, as no other Order type has dynamic state.

id.format: The string representation of the OANDA-assigned OrderID. OANDA-assigned OrderIDs are positive integers, and are derived from the TransactionID of the Transaction that created the Order.

trailingStopValue.description: The Order's calculated trailing stop value.
trailingStopValue.format: A decimal number encodes as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Price's Instrument.

triggerDistance.description: The distance between the Trailing Stop Loss Order's trailingStopValue and the current Market Price. This represents the distance (in price units) of the Order from a triggering price. If the distance could not be determined, this value will not be set.
triggerDistance.format: A decimal number encodes as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Price's Instrument.

isTriggerDistanceExact.description: True if an exact trigger distance could be calculated. If false, it means the provided trigger distance is a best estimate. If the distance could not be determined, this value will not be set.

Order.description: The base Order definition specifies the properties that are common to all Orders.

id.description: The Order's identifier, unique within the Order's Account.
id.format: The string representation of the OANDA-assigned OrderID. OANDA-assigned OrderIDs are positive integers, and are derived from the TransactionID of the Transaction that created the Order.

createTime.description: The time when the Order was created.
createTime.format: A string conforming to RFC 3339 (https://tools.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3339.txt). The amount of sub-second precision provided may represent milliseconds (000 to 999), microseconds (000000 to 999999) or nanoseconds (000000000 to 999999999).

state.description: The current state of the Order.

clientExtensions.description: The client extensions of the Order. Do not set, modify, or delete clientExtensions if your account is associated with MT4.

MarketOrder.description: A MarketOrder is an order that is filled immediately upon creation using the current market price.

id.description: The Order's identifier, unique within the Order's Account.
id.format: The string representation of the OANDA-assigned OrderID. OANDA-assigned OrderIDs are positive integers, and are derived from the TransactionID of the Transaction that created the Order.

createTime.description: The time when the Order was created.
createTime.format: A string conforming to RFC 3339 (https://tools.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3339.txt). The amount of sub-second precision provided may represent milliseconds (000 to 999), microseconds (000000 to 999999) or nanoseconds (000000000 to 999999999).

state.description: The current state of the Order.

clientExtensions.description: The client extensions of the Order. Do not set, modify, or delete clientExtensions if your account is associated with MT4.

type.description: The type of the Order. Always set to "MARKET" for Market Orders.

instrument.format: A string containing the base currency and quote currency delimited by a "_".

units.description: The quantity requested to be filled by the Market Order. A posititive number of units results in a long Order, and a negative number of units results in a short Order.
units.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on what the number represents.

timeInForce.description: The time-in-force requested for the Market Order. Restricted to FOK or IOC for a MarketOrder.

priceBound.description: The worst price that the client is willing to have the Market Order filled at.
priceBound.format: A decimal number encodes as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Price's Instrument.

positionFill.description: Specification of how Positions in the Account are modified when the Order is filled.

tradeClose.description: Details of the Trade requested to be closed, only provided when the Market Order is being used to explicitly close a Trade.

longPositionCloseout.description: Details of the long Position requested to be closed out, only provided when a Market Order is being used to explicitly closeout a long Position.

shortPositionCloseout.description: Details of the short Position requested to be closed out, only provided when a Market Order is being used to explicitly closeout a short Position.

marginCloseout.description: Details of the Margin Closeout that this Market Order was created for

delayedTradeClose.description: Details of the delayed Trade close that this Market Order was created for

takeProfitOnFill.description: TakeProfitDetails specifies the details of a Take Profit Order to be created on behalf of a client. This may happen when an Order is filled that opens a Trade requiring a Take Profit, or when a Trade's dependent Take Profit Order is modified directly through the Trade.

stopLossOnFill.description: StopLossDetails specifies the details of a Stop Loss Order to be created on behalf of a client. This may happen when an Order is filled that opens a Trade requiring a Stop Loss, or when a Trade's dependent Stop Loss Order is modified directly through the Trade.

trailingStopLossOnFill.description: TrailingStopLossDetails specifies the details of a Trailing Stop Loss Order to be created on behalf of a client. This may happen when an Order is filled that opens a Trade requiring a Trailing Stop Loss, or when a Trade's dependent Trailing Stop Loss Order is modified directly through the Trade.

tradeClientExtensions.description: Client Extensions to add to the Trade created when the Order is filled (if such a Trade is created). Do not set, modify, or delete tradeClientExtensions if your account is associated with MT4.

fillingTransactionID.description: ID of the Transaction that filled this Order (only provided when the Order's state is FILLED)
fillingTransactionID.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

filledTime.description: Date/time when the Order was filled (only provided when the Order's state is FILLED)
filledTime.format: A string conforming to RFC 3339 (https://tools.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3339.txt). The amount of sub-second precision provided may represent milliseconds (000 to 999), microseconds (000000 to 999999) or nanoseconds (000000000 to 999999999).

tradeOpenedID.description: Trade ID of Trade opened when the Order was filled (only provided when the Order's state is FILLED and a Trade was opened as a result of the fill)
tradeOpenedID.format: The string representation of the OANDA-assigned TradeID. OANDA-assigned TradeIDs are positive integers, and are derived from the TransactionID of the Transaction that opened the Trade.

tradeReducedID.description: Trade ID of Trade reduced when the Order was filled (only provided when the Order's state is FILLED and a Trade was reduced as a result of the fill)
tradeReducedID.format: The string representation of the OANDA-assigned TradeID. OANDA-assigned TradeIDs are positive integers, and are derived from the TransactionID of the Transaction that opened the Trade.

tradeClosedIDs.description: Trade IDs of Trades closed when the Order was filled (only provided when the Order's state is FILLED and one or more Trades were closed as a result of the fill)

cancellingTransactionID.description: ID of the Transaction that cancelled the Order (only provided when the Order's state is CANCELLED)
cancellingTransactionID.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

cancelledTime.description: Date/time when the Order was cancelled (only provided when the state of the Order is CANCELLED)
cancelledTime.format: A string conforming to RFC 3339 (https://tools.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3339.txt). The amount of sub-second precision provided may represent milliseconds (000 to 999), microseconds (000000 to 999999) or nanoseconds (000000000 to 999999999).

LimitOrder.description: A LimitOrder is an order that is created with a price threshold, and will only be filled by a price that is equal to or better than the threshold.

id.description: The Order's identifier, unique within the Order's Account.

tradeReducedID.format: The string representation of the OANDA-assigned TradeID. OANDA-assigned TradeIDs are positive integers, and are derived from the TransactionID of the Transaction that opened the Trade.

TrailingStopLossOrder.description: A TrailingStopLossOrder is an order that is linked to an open Trade and created with a price distance. The price distance is used to calculate a trailing stop value for the order that is in the losing direction from the market price at the time of the order's creation. The trailing stop value will follow the market price as it moves in the winning direction, and the order will filled (closing the Trade) by the first price that is equal to or worse than the trailing stop value. A TrailingStopLossOrder cannot be used to open a new Position.

id.description: The Order's identifier, unique within the Order's Account.

The trailing stop value will trail (follow) the market price by the TSL order's configured "distance" as the market price moves in the winning direction. If the market price moves to a level that is equal to or worse than the trailing stop value, the order will be filled and the Trade will be closed.

This may happen when an Order is filled that opens a Trade requiring a Trailing Stop Loss, or when a Trade's dependent Trailing Stop Loss Order is modified directly through the Trade.

tradeClientExtensions.description: Client Extensions to add to the Trade created when the Order is filled (if such a Trade is created). Do not set, modify, or delete tradeClientExtensions if your account is associated with MT4.

LimitOrderRequest.description: A LimitOrderRequest specifies the parameters that may be set when creating a Limit Order.

type.description: The type of the Order to Create. Must be set to "LIMIT" when creating a Market Order.

instrument.format: A string containing the base currency and quote currency delimited by a "_".

units.description: The quantity requested to be filled by the Limit Order. A posititive number of units results in a long Order, and a negative number of units results in a short Order.
units.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on what the number represents.

price.description: The price threshold specified for the Limit Order. The Limit Order will only be filled by a market price that is equal to or better than this price.
price.format: A decimal number encodes as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Price's Instrument.

timeInForce.description: The time-in-force requested for the Limit Order.

gtdTime.description: The date/time when the Limit Order will be cancelled if its timeInForce is "GTD".
gtdTime.format: A string conforming to RFC 3339 (https://tools.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3339.txt). The amount of sub-second precision provided may represent milliseconds (000 to 999), microseconds (000000 to 999999) or nanoseconds (000000000 to 999999999).

positionFill.description: Specification of how Positions in the Account are modified when the Order is filled.

clientExtensions.description: The client extensions to add to the Order. Do not set, modify, or delete clientExtensions if your account is associated with MT4.

instrument.format: A string containing the base currency and quote currency delimited by a "_".

units.description: The quantity requested to be filled by the Stop Order. A posititive number of units results in a long Order, and a negative number of units results in a short Order.
units.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on what the number represents.

price.description: The price threshold specified for the Stop Order. The Stop Order will only be filled by a market price that is equal to or worse than this price.
price.format: A decimal number encodes as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Price's Instrument.

priceBound.description: The worst market price that may be used to fill this Stop Order. If the market gaps and crosses through both the price and the priceBound, the Stop Order will be cancelled instead of being filled.
priceBound.format: A decimal number encodes as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Price's Instrument.

timeInForce.description: The time-in-force requested for the Stop Order.

gtdTime.description: The date/time when the Stop Order will be cancelled if its timeInForce is "GTD".

MarketIfTouchedOrderRequest.description: A MarketIfTouchedOrderRequest specifies the parameters that may be set when creating a Market-if-Touched Order.

type.description: The type of the Order to Create. Must be set to "MARKET_IF_TOUCHED" when creating a Market If Touched Order.

instrument.format: A string containing the base currency and quote currency delimited by a "_".

units.description: The quantity requested to be filled by the MarketIfTouched Order. A posititive number of units results in a long Order, and a negative number of units results in a short Order.
units.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on what the number represents.

price.description: The price threshold specified for the MarketIfTouched Order. The MarketIfTouched Order will only be filled by a market price that crosses this price from the direction of the market price at the time when the Order was created (the initialMarketPrice). Depending on the value of the Order's price and initialMarketPrice, the MarketIfTouchedOrder will behave like a Limit or a Stop Order.
price.format: A decimal number encodes as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Price's Instrument.

priceBound.description: The worst market price that may be used to fill this MarketIfTouched Order.
priceBound.format: A decimal number encodes as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Price's Instrument.

timeInForce.description: The time-in-force requested for the MarketIfTouched Order. Restricted to "GTC", "GFD" and "GTD" for MarketIfTouched Orders.

gtdTime.description: The date/time when the MarketIfTouched Order will be cancelled if its timeInForce is "GTD".
gtdTime.format: A string conforming to RFC 3339 (https://tools.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3339.txt). The amount of sub-second precision provided may represent milliseconds (000 to 999), microseconds (000000 to 999999) or nanoseconds (000000000 to 999999999).

TakeProfitOrderRequest.description: A TakeProfitOrderRequest specifies the parameters that may be set when creating a Take Profit Order.

type.description: The type of the Order to Create. Must be set to "TAKE_PROFIT" when creating a Take Profit Order.

tradeID.description: The ID of the Trade to close when the price threshold is breached.
tradeID.format: The string representation of the OANDA-assigned TradeID. OANDA-assigned TradeIDs are positive integers, and are derived from the TransactionID of the Transaction that opened the Trade.

clientTradeID.description: The client ID of the Trade to be closed when the price threshold is breached.

price.description: The price threshold specified for the TakeProfit Order. The associated Trade will be closed by a market price that is equal to or better than this threshold.
price.format: A decimal number encodes as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Price's Instrument.

timeInForce.description: The time-in-force requested for the TakeProfit Order. Restricted to "GTC", "GFD" and "GTD" for TakeProfit Orders.

gtdTime.description: The date/time when the TakeProfit Order will be cancelled if its timeInForce is "GTD".

tradeID.format: The string representation of the OANDA-assigned TradeID. OANDA-assigned TradeIDs are positive integers, and are derived from the TransactionID of the Transaction that opened the Trade.

clientTradeID.description: The client ID of the Trade to be closed when the price threshold is breached.

price.description: The price threshold specified for the StopLoss Order. The associated Trade will be closed by a market price that is equal to or worse than this threshold.
price.format: A decimal number encodes as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Price's Instrument.

timeInForce.description: The time-in-force requested for the StopLoss Order. Restricted to "GTC", "GFD" and "GTD" for StopLoss Orders.

gtdTime.description: The date/time when the StopLoss Order will be cancelled if its timeInForce is "GTD".

clientExtensions.description: The client extensions to add to the Order. Do not set, modify, or delete clientExtensions if your account is associated with MT4.

TrailingStopLossOrderRequest.description: A TrailingStopLossOrderRequest specifies the parameters that may be set when creating a Trailing Stop Loss Order.

type.description: The type of the Order to Create. Must be set to "TRAILING_STOP_LOSS" when creating a Trailng Stop Loss Order.

tradeID.description: The ID of the Trade to close when the price threshold is breached.
tradeID.format: The string representation of the OANDA-assigned TradeID. OANDA-assigned TradeIDs are positive integers, and are derived from the TransactionID of the Transaction that opened the Trade.

clientTradeID.description: The client ID of the Trade to be closed when the price threshold is breached.

distance.description: The price distance specified for the TrailingStopLoss Order.
distance.format: A decimal number encodes as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Price's Instrument.

Position.description: The specification of a Position within an Account.

instrument.format: A string containing the base currency and quote currency delimited by a "_".

pl.description: Profit/loss realized by the Position over the lifetime of the Account.
pl.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Account's home currency.

unrealizedPL.description: The unrealized profit/loss of all open Trades that contribute to this Position.
unrealizedPL.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Account's home currency.

resettablePL.description: Profit/loss realized by the Position since the Account's resettablePL was last reset by the client.
resettablePL.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Account's home currency.

long.description: The details of the long side of the Position.

short.description: The details of the short side of the Position.

PositionSide.description: The representation of a Position for a single direction (long or short).

units.description: Number of units in the position (negative value indicates short position, positive indicates long position).
units.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on what the number represents.

averagePrice.description: Volume-weighted average of the underlying Trade open prices for the Position.
averagePrice.format: A decimal number encodes as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Price's Instrument.

tradeIDs.description: List of the open Trade IDs which contribute to the open Position.

pl.description: Profit/loss realized by the PositionSide over the lifetime of the Account.
pl.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Account's home currency.

unrealizedPL.description: The unrealized profit/loss of all open Trades that contribute to this PositionSide.
unrealizedPL.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Account's home currency.

resettablePL.description: Profit/loss realized by the PositionSide since the Account's resettablePL was last reset by the client.
resettablePL.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Account's home currency.

CalculatedPositionState.description: The dynamic (calculated) state of a Position

instrument.format: A string containing the base currency and quote currency delimited by a "_".

netUnrealizedPL.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Account's home currency.

longUnrealizedPL.description: The unrealized profit/loss of the Position's long open Trades
longUnrealizedPL.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Account's home currency.

shortUnrealizedPL.description: The unrealized profit/loss of the Position's short open Trades
shortUnrealizedPL.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Account's home currency.

UserSpecifier.description: The specifier that refers to a User
UserSpecifier.format: A user specifier may have one of 3 formats: the OANDA-assigned User ID (numerical), the client-provided username prefixed by the "@" symbol (e.g. "@myusername"), or the "@" symbol. The "@" symbol on its own acts as an alias for the username of the user accessing the endpoint (as inferred from the token provided).

UserInfo.description: A representation of user information, as provided to the user themself.

userID.description: The user's OANDA-assigned user ID.

country.description: The country that the user is based in.

UserInfoExternal.description: A representation of user information, as available to external (3rd party) clients.

userID.description: The user's OANDA-assigned user ID.

country.description: The country that the user is based in.

FIFO.description: Flag indicating if the the user's Accounts adhere to FIFO execution rules.

TransactionType.description: The possible types of a Transaction

time.description: The date/time when the Transaction was created.

MarketOrderTransaction.description:
A MarketOrderTransaction represents the creation of a Market Order in the user's account. A Market Order is an Order that is filled immediately at the current market price.
Market Orders can be specialized when they are created to accomplish a specific task: to close a Trade, to closeout a Position or to particiate in in a Margin closeout.

id.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

time.description: The date/time when the Transaction was created.
time.format: A string conforming to RFC 3339 (https://tools.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3339.txt). The amount of sub-second precision provided may represent milliseconds (000 to 999), microseconds (000000 to 999999) or nanoseconds (000000000 to 999999999).

userID.description: The ID of the user that initiated the creation of the Transaction.

accountID.description: The ID of the Account the Transaction was created for.

batchID.description: The ID of the "batch" that the Transaction belongs to. Transactions in the same batch are applied to the Account simultaneously.
batchID.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

type.description: The Type of the Transaction. Always set to "MARKET_ORDER" in a MarketOrderTransaction.

instrument.format: A string containing the base currency and quote currency delimited by a "_".

units.description: The quantity requested to be filled by the Market Order. A posititive number of units results in a long Order, and a negative number of units results in a short Order.
units.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on what the number represents.

timeInForce.description: The time-in-force requested for the Market Order. Restricted to FOK or IOC for a MarketOrder.

priceBound.description: The worst price that the client is willing to have the Market Order filled at.
priceBound.format: A decimal number encodes as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Price's Instrument.

positionFill.description: Specification of how Positions in the Account are modified when the Order is filled.

tradeClose.description: Details of the Trade requested to be closed, only provided when the Market Order is being used to explicitly close a Trade.

longPositionCloseout.description: Details of the long Position requested to be closed out, only provided when a Market Order is being used to explicitly closeout a long Position.

shortPositionCloseout.description: Details of the short Position requested to be closed out, only provided when a Market Order is being used to explicitly closeout a short Position.

marginCloseout.description: Details of the Margin Closeout that this Market Order was created for

delayedTradeClose.description: Details of the delayed Trade close that this Market Order was created for

reason.description: The reason that the Market Order was created

clientExtensions.description: Client Extensions to add to the Order (only provided if the Order is being created with client extensions).

takeProfitOnFill.description: The specification of the Take Profit Order that should be created for a Trade opened when the Order is filled (if such a Trade is created).

stopLossOnFill.description: The specification of the Stop Loss Order that should be created for a Trade opened when the Order is filled (if such a Trade is created).

trailingStopLossOnFill.description: The specification of the Trailing Stop Loss Order that should be created for a Trade that is opened when the Order is filled (if such a Trade is created).

tradeClientExtensions.description: Client Extensions to add to the Trade created when the Order is filled (if such a Trade is created).  Do not set, modify, delete tradeClientExtensions if your account is associated with MT4.

MarketOrderRejectTransaction.description: A MarketOrderRejectTransaction represents the rejection of the creation of a Market Order.

id.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

time.description: The date/time when the Transaction was created.
time.format: A string conforming to RFC 3339 (https://tools.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3339.txt). The amount of sub-second precision provided may represent milliseconds (000 to 999), microseconds (000000 to 999999) or nanoseconds (000000000 to 999999999).

userID.description: The ID of the user that initiated the creation of the Transaction.

accountID.description: The ID of the Account the Transaction was created for.

batchID.description: The ID of the "batch" that the Transaction belongs to. Transactions in the same batch are applied to the Account simultaneously.
batchID.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

type.description: The Type of the Transaction. Always set to "MARKET_ORDER_REJECT" in a MarketOrderRejectTransaction.

batchID.description: The ID of the "batch" that the Transaction belongs to. Transactions in the same batch are applied to the Account simultaneously.
batchID.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

type.description: The Type of the Transaction. Always set to "STOP_LOSS_ORDER" in a StopLossOrderTransaction.

tradeID.description: The ID of the Trade to close when the price threshold is breached.
tradeID.format: The string representation of the OANDA-assigned TradeID. OANDA-assigned TradeIDs are positive integers, and are derived from the TransactionID of the Transaction that opened the Trade.

clientTradeID.description: The client ID of the Trade to be closed when the price threshold is breached.

price.description: The price threshold specified for the StopLoss Order. The associated Trade will be closed by a market price that is equal to or worse than this threshold.
price.format: A decimal number encodes as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Price's Instrument.

timeInForce.description: The time-in-force requested for the StopLoss Order. Restricted to "GTC", "GFD" and "GTD" for StopLoss Orders.

gtdTime.description: The date/time when the StopLoss Order will be cancelled if its timeInForce is "GTD".
gtdTime.format: A string conforming to RFC 3339 (https://tools.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3339.txt). The amount of sub-second precision provided may represent milliseconds (000 to 999), microseconds (000000 to 999999) or nanoseconds (000000000 to 999999999).

reason.description: The reason that the Stop Loss Order was initiated

clientExtensions.description: Client Extensions to add to the Order (only provided if the Order is being created with client extensions).

orderFillTransactionID.description: The ID of the OrderFill Transaction that caused this Order to be created (only provided if this Order was created automatically when another Order was filled).
orderFillTransactionID.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

replacesOrderID.description: The ID of the Order that this Order replaces (only provided if this Order replaces an existing Order).
replacesOrderID.format: The string representation of the OANDA-assigned OrderID. OANDA-assigned OrderIDs are positive integers, and are derived from the TransactionID of the Transaction that created the Order.

replacedOrderCancelTransactionID.description: The ID of the Transaction that cancels the replaced Order (only provided if this Order replaces an existing Order).
replacedOrderCancelTransactionID.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

tradeReduced.description: The Trade that was reduced when the Order was filled (only provided if filling the Order resulted in reducing an open Trade).

Open trades listed in this transaction will be closed once their respective instruments become tradeable.

tradeIDs.format: The string representation of the OANDA-assigned TradeID. OANDA-assigned TradeIDs are positive integers, and are derived from the TransactionID of the Transaction that opened the Trade.
